pricing_tiers.tier_description: Premier solution for smart business owners
features: Premium Integrations including Authorize.Net, Salesforce, ActiveCampaign, HubSpot, Webhooks
Site Management features like Multisite Support, Advanced Access Control, Client Management

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Everything you need to build a perfect form
features: Accept Payments including Stripe Pro, Square, PayPal, Recurring Subscriptions, No Transaction Fees, Coupons, Calculations
Advanced Form Features like 2,000+ Form Templates, Surveys & Polls, Save & Resume, Digital Signatures, Geolocation, Google Sheets, Dropbox, 8,000+ Zapier Integrations
Conversion Tools including Conversational Forms, Form Landing Pages, Lead Forms, Form Abandonment, User Journey Reports
Advanced Addons like User Registration, Post Submissions, Offline Forms, Form Permissions

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Great for businesses who want to do more
features: Marketing Integrations including Mailchimp, MailPoet, AWeber, Constant Contact, GetResponse, Campaign Monitor, ConvertKit, Drip, Brevo, MailerLite
Form Automation including Smart Workflows, Data Routing, User Segmentation, Newsletter Forms, Slack, Twilio

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Essential tools to build your online form
features: All Essential Features including Form Templates, Entry Management, Advanced Form Fields, Field Validation, Smart Conditional Logic, File Uploads, Form Notifications, Spam Protection, Privacy Compliance, Email Summaries
Customizations including Multi-page Forms, Form Layouts, Custom Thank You Pages, Import / Export Tools, Page Builder Support, Entry Previews, WPForms AI

promotional_offers.offer_description: 50% off annual pricing for all tiers.

original_app_metadata.name: WPForms
original_app_metadata.description: WPForms is a drag and drop online form builder for WordPress that allows you to easily create contact forms, email subscription forms, billing forms, donation forms, online order forms, and more.
